title: Drug Trafficking - University Area
description: Increased reports of drug activity near State University campus. Undercover operation identified potential distribution network.

persons.name: Tyler 'T-Money' Jackson
persons.description: Primary dealer. 22 years old, former student. Drives black Dodge Charger.

persons.name: Confidential Informant CI-2024-12
persons.statement: Tyler gets his supply every Thursday from someone in a silver Mercedes. Meeting spot changes weekly.

persons.name: Unknown Supplier
persons.description: Male, Hispanic, 30s, drives silver Mercedes C-Class. Partial plate: 7XK

persons.name: Ashley Brooks
persons.statement: My roommate overdosed last month. She bought from a guy everyone calls T-Money.

evidence.description: Text message records from controlled buy
